palette.title: 5 things about moon
palette.description: I was challenged by fellow ColourLover earlgrey to share with the community 5 things about myself...through colours! :D Here are my choices: 1) show us your teeth. They called me "The Shark" when I was younger - my baby teeth wouldn't fall off, while my permanent ones were already on their way. So you see, I had way more teeth than needed and absolutely no room for a good half of them. I had to have them removed by force and then it took a lot of time, money and pain to rearrange my devastated mouth. How do you hide it from other people? It's not like you can keep quiet forever, and trust me, the more you try to conceal it the more people notice. Now I'm 22 and my dentist says that my perfectly straight teeth are his own masterpiece. 2) writing a novel. I've been writing novels since I was 13...in my head. Someday I will be ready to share at least one of them with the world, ad it will be awesome - if not the novel itsfelf, the very same act of bringing it to real life. 3) watership down. A book about bunnies. I love these animals with all my might - but never had one because my parent's wouldn't let me. 4) ice queen.Just because at time I don't know how to show that I care it doesn't mean that I don't. 5) waterworks. I was an overly sensitive child and my teacher used to say that I reminded her of a water tap. Although she didn't want to offend me I usually ended up crying even more. EDIT: oh right, I almost forgot - Psycho Jello, Acitauca & sugary, I tagged you :P
